table.name: vtiger_subscriberslist
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_subscriberslist` ( `subscriberslistid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `list_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `module_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `conditions` text ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_subscriberslistcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_subscriberslistcf` ( `subscriberslistid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`subscriberslistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
